title: Last week (Friday)there was a story about copperhead snakes found in Odgen.  Can you tell me what part of Odgen they were located?
text:
WECT
reported that story. They say it was Ogden Park.



Here's a link to their story:
http://www.wect.com/story/15127302/copperheads-congregate-in-one-ogden-neighborhood
